mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device_alarm_detail ( device_num, location, alarm_type, alarm_description, alarm_date, apply_status, apply_date ) VALUES ( #{deviceNum}, #{location}, #{alarmType}, #{alarmDescription} #{alarmDate}, #{applyStatus}, #{applyDate} )

INSERT INTO device_alarm_type ( device_num, ch4_gas_status, bat_vol_status, well_lid_status, temperature_status, water_depth_status ) VALUES ( #{deviceNum}, #{ch4GasStatus}, #{batVolStatus}, #{wellLidStatus}, #{temperatureStatus}, #{waterDepthStatus} )
mapper.sql: SELECT t.id, t.device_num AS deviceNum, t.ch4_gas_status AS ch4GasStatus, t.bat_vol_status AS batVolStatus, t.well_lid_status AS wellLidStatus, t.temperature_status AS temperatureStatus, t.water_depth_status AS waterDepthStatus FROM device_alarm_type t

SELECT t.id, t.device_num AS deviceNum, t.location, t.alarm_type AS t.alarmType, t.alarm_description AS alarmDescription, t.apply_status AS applyStatus, t.apply_date AS applyDate, t.alarm_date AS alarmDate FROM device_alarm_detail t
